mistral:7b-instruct: Given your specific health condition of hypertension, a chronic disease requiring regular medical attention, the EPO plan from GMHBA Health Insurance is well-suited to your needs. With a monthly premium of $300, this plan offers coverage up to $500,000 for hospitalization, outpatient services, prescription drugs, and preventive care. This comprehensive coverage will help manage your medical expenses related to hypertension treatment. Furthermore, the annual deductible of $2500 and maximum out-of-pocket expense of $6500 provide a level of financial protection suitable for individuals in a low income bracket, ensuring affordable access to essential healthcare services. Additionally, this plan excludes cosmetic procedures and experimental treatments, keeping costs down for services not directly related to your health condition.
